entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -10.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 10:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -10.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -12.4°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight then increasing to 50 gusting to 70. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Windy. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
